document_data.mainbody:
Barrodar was a successful merchant and shopkeeper inhabiting the city of Zhentil Keep during the midâ€“14 century DR.
Barrodar owned Barrodars Fantastic Fabrics in the western section of Zhentil Keeps Foreign Quarter. The role of successful businessman was a mere facade. Barrodar was actually the top fence within Zhentil Keep following the citys destruction in the . Allied to no one, he served his own best interests and only dealt with someone he knew.
He lost his first business during Zhentil Keeps destruction but bounced back quickly. Within just three days, Barrodar took control of an abandoned shop and started his new venture.
